bug.author: voyageth
bug.summary: Broken link in "A Tool Developer's Guide..." for graph_metrics.py
bug.description: In <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/how_tos/tool_developers/index.html>this page</denchmark-link> , graph_metrics.py link broken. graph_metrics.py is deleted by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/d8c94dba8f53626077b21f90df309577827a0f18#diff-2839c4fb2e611a1359978388f55f3583>this commit</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: Thanks for the report. Internal bug opened, but community fix welcome also.
Is anyone working on this internally? I can work on this. If yes, then should I just remove that line or replace it with a link to some other file?
So far as I know, no one is working on it yet. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/danmane>@danmane</denchmark-link> ?
